Interface BlackboardServesDomain

All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface BlackboardServesDomain

A Domains view of the blackboard.

getABATranslation

ABATranslation getABATranslation(AttributeBasedAddress aba)
Get ABA translation status.

Parameters:
aba - the ABA to translate
Returns:
an ABATranslation giving translations of an ABA. Returns null if the translations are unchanged.
